pages.text: $(major)Cells/$ are a recipe ingredient used in the creation of $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/dna_helix)DNA Helices/$.$(br2)This is done in the $(l:geneticsresequenced:blocks/dna_extractor)DNA Extractor/$.
Each entity has its own Cell, which can be processed into a $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/dna_helix)DNA Helix/$ of the entity's type.$(br2)You can see the Cell's entity type in the item's tooltip.
